```{ojs}
//| echo: false

// Import d3 library
d3 = require("d3@7")

// Create some sample data
data = [
  {name: "A", value: 30},
  {name: "B", value: 80},
  {name: "C", value: 45},
  {name: "D", value: 60},
  {name: "E", value: 20}
]

// Create interactive inputs
viewof selectedValue = Inputs.range([10, 100], {value: 50, step: 1, label: "Filter threshold:"})

viewof chartType = Inputs.radio(["bar", "circle"], {value: "bar", label: "Chart type:"})

// Filter data based on input
filteredData = data.filter(d => d.value >= selectedValue)

// Create dynamic chart based on type selection
chart = {
  const width = 400;
  const height = 300;
  const margin = {top: 20, right: 20, bottom: 40, left: 40};
  
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
    .attr("width", width)
    .attr("height", height);
    
  if (chartType === "bar") {
    // Bar chart
    const xScale = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(filteredData.map(d => d.name))
      .range([margin.left, width - margin.right])
      .padding(0.1);
      
    const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, d3.max(filteredData, d => d.value)])
      .range([height - margin.bottom, margin.top]);
    
    svg.selectAll("rect")
      .data(filteredData)
      .join("rect")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.name))
      .attr("y", d => yScale(d.value))
      .attr("width", xScale.bandwidth())
      .attr("height", d => yScale(0) - yScale(d.value))
      .attr("fill", "steelblue");
      
    // Add axes
    svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(0,${height - margin.bottom})`)
      .call(d3.axisBottom(xScale));
      
    svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},0)`)
      .call(d3.axisLeft(yScale));
      
  } else {
    // Circle chart
    const xScale = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(filteredData.map(d => d.name))
      .range([margin.left, width - margin.right])
      .padding(0.1);
      
    const radiusScale = d3.scaleSqrt()
      .domain([0, d3.max(filteredData, d => d.value)])
      .range([0, 30]);
    
    svg.selectAll("circle")
      .data(filteredData)
      .join("circle")
      .attr("cx", d => xScale(d.name) + xScale.bandwidth() / 2)
      .attr("cy", height / 2)
      .attr("r", d => radiusScale(d.value))
      .attr("fill", "coral")
      .attr("opacity", 0.7);
      
    // Add labels
    svg.selectAll("text")
      .data(filteredData)
      .join("text")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.name) + xScale.bandwidth() / 2)
      .attr("y", height / 2 + 5)
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .text(d => d.name)
      .attr("font-size", "12px");
  }
  
  return svg.node();
}

// Display summary statistics
html`<div style="background: #f5f5f5; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; margin: 10px 0;">
  <h3>Summary</h3>
  <p><strong>Threshold:</strong> ${selectedValue}</p>
  <p><strong>Items shown:</strong> ${filteredData.length} of ${data.length}</p>
  <p><strong>Chart type:</strong> ${chartType}</p>
  <p><strong>Average value:</strong> ${d3.mean(filteredData, d => d.value).toFixed(1)}</p>
</div>`
